comment:
* Contains data required by engines to synthesize speech. This data is: *
    *
  • The text to synthesize
    • *
  • The synthesis locale, represented as a language, country and a variant. * The language is an ISO 639-3 letter language code, and the country is an * ISO 3166 alpha 3 code. The variant is not specified.
    • *
  • The name of the voice requested for this synthesis. May be empty if * the client uses {@link TextToSpeech#setLanguage} instead of * {@link TextToSpeech#setVoice}
    • *
  • The synthesis speech rate, with 100 being the normal, and * higher values representing higher speech rates.
    • *
  • The voice pitch, with 100 being the default pitch.
    • *
* * Any additional parameters sent to the text to speech service are passed in * uninterpreted, see the {@code params} argument in {@link TextToSpeech#speak} * and {@link TextToSpeech#synthesizeToFile}.

methods.name: public String getText()
methods.comment:
* Gets the text which should be synthesized.
     * @deprecated As of API level 21, replaced by {@link #getCharSequenceText}.

methods.name: public CharSequence getCharSequenceText()
methods.comment: * Gets the text which should be synthesized.

methods.name: public String getVoiceName()
methods.comment: * Gets the name of the voice to use.

methods.name: public String getLanguage()
methods.comment: * Gets the ISO 3-letter language code for the language to use.

methods.name: public String getCountry()
methods.comment: * Gets the ISO 3-letter country code for the language to use.

methods.name: public String getVariant()
methods.comment: * Gets the language variant to use.

methods.name: public int getSpeechRate()
methods.comment: * Gets the speech rate to use. The normal rate is 100.

methods.name: public int getPitch()
methods.comment: * Gets the pitch to use. The normal pitch is 100.

methods.name: public Bundle getParams()
methods.comment: * Gets the additional params, if any.

methods.name: void setLanguage(String language, String country, String variant)
methods.comment: * Sets the locale for the request.

methods.name: void setVoiceName(String voiceName)
methods.comment: * Sets the voice name for the request.

methodNames: void setLanguage(String language, String country, String variant)
